about_the_game:
The prologue of “Single Diary” series game, presented and designed by “THEMIS entertainment”


Discord：
Raiders：
Raider Video：

  • Story Briefing

    I was a new fresh graduated just start exploring the city life, age == single, living in the downtown city named “egg yolk” and trying to date with different girls. Given the liad-back life style is easy, but the apartment rental cost pressure was still there (however, landlord’s daughter is quite pretty)
    What I shall move forward to have wonderful and beautiful life.


  • Numbers of main actress for game players

    Whatever you like, big or small one or all of them.

    Just need to have more interaction, you can touch her heard and understand what they think, may find out deeper in mind or something unknown, could be explore special relationship…


  • Touching and exploring system, touch wherever you want.

    You can touch any background item in different scene, i.e. Bed, pillow, swing and etc.
    Also, you can touch girls’ hair, skirt, any place of her body..everywhere all upto you.
    What kind of reaction will be happened ? so much to be expecting…


  • Highly free timing system, you can write your owned diary by yourself.

    In the “egg yolk” downtown , all kind of event will be triggered anything.
    You can decide when and where to go by your demand.
    Probably, you will accidentally meet lovely girls.


  • More than 50 stages in game scene, free to explore big map system.

    The scene will be changed to at least four different type by time, from morning to late night, you will reach different event or game scene. The map system may also hide special event for you to explore.

* Characters depicted in this game are 20 years of age or older.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

detailed_description:
The prologue of “Single Diary” series game, presented and designed by “THEMIS entertainment”


Discord：
Raiders：
Raider Video：

  • Story Briefing

    I was a new fresh graduated just start exploring the city life, age == single, living in the downtown city named “egg yolk” and trying to date with different girls. Given the liad-back life style is easy, but the apartment rental cost pressure was still there (however, landlord’s daughter is quite pretty)
    What I shall move forward to have wonderful and beautiful life.


  • Numbers of main actress for game players

    Whatever you like, big or small one or all of them.

    Just need to have more interaction, you can touch her heard and understand what they think, may find out deeper in mind or something unknown, could be explore special relationship…


  • Touching and exploring system, touch wherever you want.

    You can touch any background item in different scene, i.e. Bed, pillow, swing and etc.
    Also, you can touch girls’ hair, skirt, any place of her body..everywhere all upto you.
    What kind of reaction will be happened ? so much to be expecting…


  • Highly free timing system, you can write your owned diary by yourself.

    In the “egg yolk” downtown , all kind of event will be triggered anything.
    You can decide when and where to go by your demand.
    Probably, you will accidentally meet lovely girls.


  • More than 50 stages in game scene, free to explore big map system.

    The scene will be changed to at least four different type by time, from morning to late night, you will reach different event or game scene. The map system may also hide special event for you to explore.

* Characters depicted in this game are 20 years of age or older.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 1536 MB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Single Diary: Fresh Graduate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.4, AMD Athlon(TM) X2 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad 2.7 Ghz, AMD Phenom(TM)II X4 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
